verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician בִּנְגִינֹ֑ת <WH5058> on Neginoth מִזְמ֖וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm לְאָסָ֣ף <WH623> of Asaph שִֽׁיר׃ <WH7892> [or] Song נוֹדָ֣ע <WH3045> known בִּֽיהוּדָ֣ה <WH3063> In Judah אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> [is] God בְּ֝יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> in Israel גָּד֥וֹל <WH1419> [is] great שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <WH8034> his name
וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> is in בְשָׁלֵ֣ם <WH8004> In Salem סֻכּ֑וֹ <WH5520> also is his tabernacle וּמְע֖וֹנָת֣וֹ <WH4585> and his dwelling place בְצִיּֽוֹן׃ <WH6726> in Zion

שָׁ֭מָּה <WH8033> There שִׁבַּ֣ר <WH7665> There brake רִשְׁפֵי־ <WH7565> he the arrows קָ֑שֶׁת <WH7198> of the bow מָגֵ֬ן <WH4043> the shield וְחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> and the sword וּמִלְחָמָ֣ה <WH4421> and the battle סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah
נָ֭אוֹר <WH215> Thou [art] more glorious אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you אַדִּ֗יר <WH117> [and] excellent מֵֽהַרְרֵי־ <WH2042> than the mountains טָֽרֶף׃ <WH2964> of prey

אֶשְׁתּוֹלְל֨וּ ׀ <WH7997> are spoiled אַבִּ֣ירֵי <WH47> strong לֵ֭ב <WH3820> care for נָמ֣וּ <WH5123> they have slept שְׁנָתָ֑ם <WH8142> their sleep וְלֹא־ <WH3808> could מָצְא֖וּ <WH4672> have found כָל־ <WH3605> and none אַנְשֵׁי־ <WH582> and none of the men חַ֣יִל <WH2428> of might יְדֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH3027> their hands
מִ֭גַּעֲרָ֣תְךָ <WH1606> At thy rebuke אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> O God יַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> of Jacob נִ֝רְדָּ֗ם <WH7290> are cast into a dead sleep וְרֶ֣כֶב <WH7393> both the chariot וָסֽוּס׃ <WH5483> and horse

אַתָּ֤ה ׀ <WH859> You נ֥וֹרָא <WH3372> Thou [even] thou [art] to be feared אַ֗תָּה <WH859> you וּמִֽי־ <WH4310> and who יַעֲמֹ֥ד <WH5975> and who may stand לְפָנֶ֗יךָ <WH6440> in thy sight מֵאָ֥ז <WH227> when אַפֶּֽךָ׃ <WH639> anger
מִ֭שָּׁמַיִם <WH8064> from heaven הִשְׁמַ֣עְתָּ <WH8085> to be heard דִּ֑ין <WH1779> Thou didst cause judgment אֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> the earth יָֽרְאָ֣ה <WH3372> feared וְשָׁקָֽטָה׃ <WH8252> and was still

בְּקוּם־ <WH6965> arose לַמִּשְׁפָּ֥ט <WH4941> to judgment אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> When God לְהוֹשִׁ֖יעַ <WH3467> to save כָּל־ <WH3605> all עַנְוֵי־ <WH6035> all the meek אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> of the earth סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For חֲמַ֣ת <WH2534> Surely the wrath אָדָ֣ם <WH120> of man תּוֹדֶ֑ךָּ <WH3034> shall praise שְׁאֵרִ֖ית <WH7611> thee the remainder חֵמֹ֣ת <WH2534> of wrath תַּחְגֹּֽר׃ <WH2296> shalt thou restrain

נִֽדֲר֣וּ <WH5087> Vow וְשַׁלְּמוּ֮ <WH7999> and pay לַיהוָ֪ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱ‍ֽלֹהֵ֫יכֶ֥ם <WH430> your God כָּל־ <WH3605> all סְבִיבָ֑יו <WH5439> let all that be round about יוֹבִ֥ילוּ <WH2986> him bring שַׁ֝֗י <WH7862> presents לַמּוֹרָֽא׃ <WH4172> unto him that ought to be feared
יִ֭בְצֹר <WH1219> He shall cut off ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> the spirit נְגִידִ֑ים <WH5057> of princes נ֝וֹרָ֗א <WH3372> [he is] terrible לְמַלְכֵי־ <WH4428> to the kings אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth
